name: Content Progress
description: Content Progress provides insight on the content viewed and not viewed by users in a selection of org units during a specified date range. Only active users are included in this report. This advanced data set is intended to replace the corresponding standard data exports so that all analytics reside in a single tool. Required Permission Advanced Data Sets > Can execute Content Progress (Organization level)

columns.name: Course Offering ID
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the course offering. Field can be null.

columns.name: Course Offering Code
columns.description: Often the course identifier from an SIS system. Field can be null.

columns.name: Course Offering Name
columns.description: Name of the course offering. Field can be null.

columns.name: Course Section ID
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the section. May contain a list if there are multiple sections. Field can be null.

columns.name: Course Section Code
columns.description: Client defined code for the section. May contain a list if there are multiple sections. Field can be null.

columns.name: Course Section Name
columns.description: Name of the section. May contain a list if there are multiple sections. Field can be null.

columns.name: Semester ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Semester that the course offering belongs to. May contain a list if there are multiple sections. Field can be null.

columns.name: Semester Code
columns.description: Unique code for the semester that the course offering belongs to. May contain a list if there are multiple sections. Field can be null.

columns.name: Semester Name
columns.description: Semester that the course offering belongs to. May contain a list if there are multiple sections. Field can be null.

columns.name: User ID
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the user. Field can be null.

columns.name: User Name
columns.description: User's username. Field can be null.

columns.name: Org Defined ID
columns.description: User's Org Defined Id (often the learner identifier from an SIS system).

columns.name: First Name
columns.description: User's first name. Field can be null.

columns.name: Last Name
columns.description: User's last name. Field can be null.

columns.name: Role ID
columns.description: User's role Id at the specific course offering. Field can be null.

columns.name: Role Name
columns.description: User's role at the specific course offering. Field can be null.

columns.name: Content Topic ID
columns.description: D2L's unique identifier for the content topic. Field can be null.

columns.name: Content Topic Name
columns.description: Name of the content topic. Field can be null.

columns.name: Module ID
columns.description: Unique identifier of the module. This only displays output from the direct parent. Field can be null.

columns.name: Module Name
columns.description: Name of the module. This only displays output from the direct parent Field can be null.

columns.name: Content Topic Visits
columns.description: Number of visits the user made to topics in the org. Field can be null.

columns.name: Total Time Spent
columns.description: Time in seconds the user spent in the topics in the org. Field can be null.

columns.name: Last Visited Date
columns.description: Last date/time a user accessed the course content.
